headline: Gartner, Stellantis, And Novo Nordisk Are Among Top 10 Large Cap Losers Last Week (Feb. 2-Feb. 6): Are the Others in Your Portfolio?
summary: Large-cap losers last week (Feb. 2–Feb. 6) were hit by weak earnings/guidance and analyst downgrades—led by Stellantis, Gartner, PayPal, Reddit, and Novo Nordisk.
